replies.body: Upvote this comment for no reason

Now I just wish I was a cosplayer.



And had money.



And was creative.

Practice solves two of those. Jobs solve the other.

(Jobs, and lack of a social life).

Practice can't solve all the problems. The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again expecting a different result.  Maybe creativity isn't your fling{{champion:27}} but there is always something out there that you can be good at.

amen bro

I'd really like to see someone create a nice {{champion:154}} skin and theme it as snowball zac.  His body could be made of snow, the q would have the snow from his hands fall off if it hits and leave snow on the group to collect or it melts when it expires.  His w could have some small snow flakes fall around him and his e would make him into a snowball being launched.  As for the ulti he could turn into a giant snowball and have small bits of snow disperse from the area after each bounce. For his passive he would burst into snow flakes and have a little glitter effect when it happens after it activates, then melt into water when he fails to regenerate.
